items.sentence: Tom walked into the living room with a smile on his face.
Tom covered for Mary when she had to take a few days off.
There's no way you'll be able to persuade Tom to do that.
Why did Tom agree to do that if he knew that he couldn't?
This milk actually tastes like milk is supposed to taste.
It's essential that this gets done by the end of the day.
I'd be very grateful if you could help me move this sofa.
If you don't pay up, you'll never see your brother again.
Tom wished that he didn't have to get rid of his old car.
Tsunamis swept through rice fields and flooded the towns.
Tom told me that it was Mary who had organized the party.
Tom has a good grasp of grammar, but is weak in spelling.
Tom's car wouldn't start and he had to get a new battery.
It's not likely that Tom will ever admit that he's wrong.
What did you think of the movie on a scale of one to ten?
I thought that you were supposed to be looking after Tom.
I thought that Tom wouldn't be able to understand French.
I doubt very seriously Tom will be in Boston next Monday.
It's good that you were able to go to Australia with Tom.
I figure that there's no point in trying to persuade Tom.
